channel.title: [Help]Something isn't right[Help]
channel.description:
I correctly add the models, made the proper ints, even add the proper models to the item.java server side, and I see get this::
[img]http://img185.imageshack.us/img185/4733/39555424.png[/img]
And it keeps putting it into the weapon spot for some reason, which is why I think its not showing up correct.
[img]http://img44.imageshack.us/img44/3862/56987185.png[/img]
[code] if(i == 10558) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Weild"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 10559; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 10558; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 10558; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = 10560; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = 10560; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 800; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Elite Black DragonPlate"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "Forged of King Dragons blood".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code]
Just incase someone wanted the ints. 10558 is the wear model, 10559 is the drop model, and 10560 is the sleeves.
If anyone could help, that would be greatly noted. Either reply here, or add me msn
imortal@pc-corp.net
Thanks.

item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

set your priorities in datmaker to 10.
make sure you DONT check the little box

item.title: [Help]Something isn't right[Help]
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Server sided.
Item.java and Item4.java. (If you have one)

You will need to add the item id in the body section and the platebody section.

Read full topic
